languages.text:
The wearer cannot suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect by walking over burning cells.
The wearer inflicts +3 additional stacks of burning whenever they stand on burning cells.

traits.locale_text:
The wearer can't suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} by walking over the burning cells.
The wearer inflicts +3 additional stacks of burning whenever they stand on burning cells.

The wearer cannot suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect by walking over burning cells.
The wearer inflicts +3 additional stacks of burning whenever they stand on burning cells.

The wearer cannot suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect by walking over burning cells.
The wearer inflicts +3 additional stacks of burning whenever they stand on burning cells.

languages.text:
装备者经过{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}的格子时，不会受到燃烧效果影响。
当装备者站在燃烧的格子上时，施加的所有燃烧效果都会额外提高3层。
languages.original_text:
The wearer cannot suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect by walking over burning cells.
The wearer inflicts +3 additional stacks of burning whenever they stand on burning cells.

traits.locale_text:
装备者经过{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}的格子时，不会受到燃烧{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}影响。
当装备者站在燃烧的格子上时，施加的所有燃烧效果都会额外提高3层。

装备者经过{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}的格子时，不会受到燃烧{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}影响。
当装备者站在燃烧的格子上时，施加的所有燃烧效果都会额外提高3层。

languages.text:
Персонаж не получает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, проходя по горящим клеткам.
Стоя на горящих клетках, персонаж накладывает +3 уровня эффекта горения дополнительно.
languages.original_text:
The wearer cannot suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect by walking over burning cells.
The wearer inflicts +3 additional stacks of burning whenever they stand on burning cells.

traits.locale_text:
Персонаж не получает {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, проходя по горящим клеткам.
Стоя на горящих клетках, персонаж накладывает +3 уровня эффекта горения дополнительно.

Персонаж не получает {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, проходя по горящим клеткам.
Стоя на горящих клетках, персонаж накладывает +3 уровня эффекта горения дополнительно.

languages.text:
炎上セルを歩いて通る際、使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}効果を受けない。
使用者は炎上セル上に立っている者に対し、炎上+3の追加スタックを負わせることができる。
languages.original_text:
The wearer cannot suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect by walking over burning cells.
The wearer inflicts +3 additional stacks of burning whenever they stand on burning cells.

traits.locale_text:
炎上セルを歩いて通る際に{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を受けない。
炎上セル上に立っているものに対し、炎上+3の追加スタックを負わせることができる。

炎上セルを歩いて通る際に{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を受けない。
炎上セル上に立っているものに対し、炎上+3の追加スタックを負わせることができる。

languages.text:
El portador no sufre el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} al caminar sobre casillas en llamas.
El portador inflige +3 acumulaciones adicionales de quemadura mientras se encuentre sobre una casilla en llamas.
languages.original_text:
The wearer cannot suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect by walking over burning cells.
The wearer inflicts +3 additional stacks of burning whenever they stand on burning cells.

traits.locale_text:
El portador no sufre el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} al caminar sobre casillas en llamas.
El portador inflige +3 acumulaciones adicionales de quemadura mientras se encuentre sobre una casilla en llamas.

languages.text:
Der Träger erleidet beim Betreten von brennenden Feldern keinen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}-Effekt.
Der Träger verursacht +3 zusätzliche Stapel Verbrennen, wenn er auf brennenden Zellen steht.
languages.original_text:
The wearer cannot suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect by walking over burning cells.
The wearer inflicts +3 additional stacks of burning whenever they stand on burning cells.

traits.locale_text:
Der Träger erleidet beim Betreten von brennenden Zellen keinen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g}.
Der Träger verursacht +3 zusätzliche Stapel Verbrennen, immer wenn er auf brennenden Zellen steht.

languages.text:
L'utilisateur est invulnérable à l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} lorsqu'il marche sur les cases embrasées.
L'utilisateur inflige +3 cumuls supplémentaires de l'effet Combustion lorsqu'il se tient sur des cases embrasées.

The wearer inflicts +3 additional stacks of burning whenever they stand on burning cells.

languages.text:
Giyen kişi, yanan hücrelerden geçerken {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} etkisine maruz kalmaz.
Giyen kişi, yanan hücrelerin üzerinde dururken +3 ilave yanma birikimi oluşturur.
